long_description: On long-distance road trips or quick drives to the dog park, you can keep Fido securely separated in the back of your vehicle with this Pet Partition space barrier from PortablePET. Strong powder-coated steel barrier adjusts in width (34 in. to 60 in.) and height (23 in. to 45 in.) to fit your vehicle. Instructions included; screw driver required for assembly.
short_description: On long-distance road trips or quick drives to the dog park, you can keep Fido securely separated in the back of your vehicle with this Pet Partition space barrier from PortablePET.
